purpose: Define clear ownership and accountability for each governance action within WyneOS.

GovernanceEngine.description: Automated evaluation engine for policy and rules.

AssuranceEngine.description: Responsible for oversight of compliance and audit.
responsibilities: ensure runtime activity aligns with policy

TelemetryLayer.description: Collects and validates all operational signals.

EmergentEngine.description: Provides adaptive behaviour when allowed by policy.

governanceFlow.sealValidation: CoreController is responsible for verifying all seals.
governanceFlow.auditVerification: AssuranceEngine confirms all events are recorded.
governanceFlow.telemetryDependency: Every decision must rely on validated telemetry.
governanceFlow.fallbackDecision: CoreController triggers fallback when anomalies occur.

summary.statement: These responsibilities define how WyneOS operates safely and consistently. Each component has a clear role and must remain within its authority.
